      • GetRecognizeAndImportToHtml

        public java.io.File GetRecognizeAndImportToHtml(java.lang.String name,
                                                java.lang.String ocrEngineLang,
                                                java.lang.String folder,
                                                java.lang.String storage)
                                         throws ApiException
        Recognize text from the image file in the storage and import it to HTML format.
        Parameters:
        name - The image file name(required). Acceptable image formats is jpg, gif, png, bmp, tiff.
        ocrEngineLang - OCR engine language - language (optional, default to en). Allowed values is "en", "de", "fr", "ru".
        folder - The source image folder. (optional)
        storage - The source image storage. (optional)
        Returns:
        File
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

      • GetRecognizeAndImportToHtmlAsync

        public com.squareup.okhttp.Call GetRecognizeAndImportToHtmlAsync(java.lang.String name,
                                                                 java.lang.String ocrEngineLang,
                                                                 java.lang.String folder,
                                                                 java.lang.String storage,
                                                                 ApiCallback<java.io.File> callback)
                                                          throws ApiException
        Recognize text from the image file in the storage and import it to HTML format. (asynchronously)
        Parameters:
        name - The image file name(required). Acceptable image formats is jpg, gif, png, bmp, tiff.
        ocrEngineLang - OCR engine language - language (optional, default to en). Allowed values is "en", "de", "fr", "ru".
        folder - The source image folder. (optional)
        storage - The source image storage. (optional)
        callback - The callback to be executed when the API call finishes
        Returns:
        The request call
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to process the API call, e.g. serializing the request body object

      • GetRecognizeAndTranslateToHtml

        public java.io.File GetRecognizeAndTranslateToHtml(java.lang.String name,
                                                   java.lang.String srcLang,
                                                   java.lang.String resLang,
                                                   java.lang.String folder,
                                                   java.lang.String storage)
                                            throws ApiException
        Recognize text from the image file in the storage, import it to HTML format and translate to specified language.
        Parameters:
        name - The image file name(required). Acceptable image formats is jpg, gif, png, bmp, tiff.
        srcLang - Source language - also supposed as the OCR engine language (required). Allowed values is "en", "de", "fr", "ru".
        resLang - Result language. (required)
        folder - The source image folder. (optional)
        storage - The source image storage. (optional)
        Returns:
        File
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

      • GetRecognizeAndTranslateToHtmlAsync

        public com.squareup.okhttp.Call GetRecognizeAndTranslateToHtmlAsync(java.lang.String name,
                                                                    java.lang.String srcLang,
                                                                    java.lang.String resLang,
                                                                    java.lang.String folder,
                                                                    java.lang.String storage,
                                                                    ApiCallback<java.io.File> callback)
                                                             throws ApiException
        Recognize text from the image file in the storage, import it to HTML format and translate to specified language. (asynchronously)
        Parameters:
        name - The image file name(required). Acceptable image formats is jpg, gif, png, bmp, tiff.
        srcLang - Source language - also supposed as the OCR engine language (required). Allowed values is "en", "de", "fr", "ru".
        resLang - Result language. (required)
        folder - The source image folder. (optional)
        storage - The source image storage. (optional)
        callback - The callback to be executed when the API call finishes
        Returns:
        The request call
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to process the API call, e.g. serializing the request body object
